projects.label: Disc Golf Disc API
projects.excerpt: A simple rest API displays up do date disc golf data, hosted on fly.io and can be accessed though rapidapi

projects.label: Full Stack List Management Web App
projects.excerpt: Web app that lets users view, edit and delete notes. It also uses passport to allow users to login, logout and make an account

projects.label: Disc Golf Club Rating and Scoring Web App
projects.excerpt: A Disc golf scoring system that allows users to login, create a club, add members, and score rounds with a custom rating system that I created. It also has a leaderboard that shows the top rated players in the club along with a history.

projects.label: This Blog
projects.excerpt: This blog was made with React, Nextjs and TinaCMS. It pulls static data from github and local json files at build time.

projects.label: Twitter Bot for New Disc Golf Discs
projects.excerpt: A twitter bot that posts when new discs are added to the PDGA site. It uses a custom machine learning model to accurately predict flight characteristics of new discs.

projects.label: Blog for Loretta Anderson
projects.excerpt: A statically generated blog that uses Sanity, Next.js, React and SSR.
A collection of my solutions of competitive programming problems on kattis
projects.label: Competitive Programming
